item.description:
Join the Innitou Ski Runners from Glen, NH at the 2012 BSSC Blizzard in Boston!! Club Royale opens at 5:30pm - swag bags for first 500 through the door! Give-away's include Ski Vacations, Snow Boards, Skis, Lift Tickets & more.

Tickets are $15 in advance or $20 at the door. There will be DJ music & Dancing, Appetizers, and a Cash Bar. See you there!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Join the Innitou Ski Runners at the 2012 BSSC Blizzard in Boston!
